News.headline: Sunday Football At The Daggers: 27th November
News.page_title: Sunday Football At The Daggers: 27th November
News.URL_keywords: Sunday Football At The Daggers: 27th November
News.short_description: Enjoy a packed Sunday of football at the Daggers Bar.
News.description:
Football Sundays will be back between 12:00-7:00pm on Sunday with three games being shown live on Sky Sports. Watford are at home to Stoke City which kicks off at 12:00pm, Bournemouth are away to Arsenal at 2:15pm and finally Ronald Koeman will take his Everton side to his former club Southampton which kicks off at 4:30pm. 

Take advantage of the Football Sundays offers on selected drinks at £2.49, which include; Carling, Cask Ale, Bottle Coors, Carling English Cider and Koppaberg.

These offers are open to members only. Season ticket holders are automatically members but anyone wishing to buy a membership on the day can do so by asking a member of bar staff. So make sure you buy your membership for just £2!
